subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Mirror, mirror on the wall.......
author: David Koenig
full_text:
Don't do it!

On Wed, Nov 9, 2011 at 12:00 PM, Frank Sumption
<purplealiengirl@...>wrote:

> **
>
>
>  Time for me to back the fuck up and look in the mirror. Since day one,
> one arguement after another over the boxes, what they are for, who can use
> it, how one jerkoff or another is the master box user and determines who
> can use the box, and always somebody claims my work no good, while theirs
> superior.  I'm jumping off this track, ya want it? You got it, someone else
> can have the loonies, the con men, the tricksters, the posers, and the
> "ones that know better". Not getting sucked into the dark with this box
> crap any longer, it was supposed to be for my own use anyway, y'all simply
> can't handle that level of spirit communication. Learned the hard way that
> there is a reason why certain knowledge is withheld from the uninitiated.
>  I can't fix what I have done, all I can do is walk away. Like the guy said
> "you can't handle the truth!"
>
>  Not gonna debate it, been there done that, no one hears or listens,
> always " Oh, I know so much better" is the response. "For my research",
> yeah, heard that about five hundred times!
>
>  Time for me to seek the light side of the force--while there is still
> time.
>
>  Frank Sumption
>  
>
